org.mt4j.components.bounds
Class BoundsZPlaneRectangle

java.lang.Object
  org.mt4j.components.bounds.BoundsZPlaneRectangle
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBoundingShape
public class BoundsZPlaneRectangle
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBoundingShape

Bounding rectangle for 2D shapes that are parallel to the Z=0 plane.

Author:
Christopher Ruff

getHeightXYVectLocal

public Vector3D getHeightXYVectLocal()
Gets the "height vector". The vector is calculated from the bounds vectors, representing a vector with the height as its length in object space.

Specified by:
getHeightXYVectLocal in interface IBoundingShape
Returns:
the height xy vect obj space vector representing the height of the boundingshape of the shape
